en.title: Complete Guide to Cat Odor Control: Litter Box, Body Odor, and Room Smells
en.content:
Odor is a common concern when living with cats. With proper measures, you can maintain a comfortable living environment.

Litter Box Odor Control

The litter box is the primary source of odor. Cleaning at least twice a day, using highly deodorizing cat litter, and utilizing a system litter box are all effective measures. Placing a deodorizer near the litter box is also recommended.

Body Odor Control

Healthy cats have virtually no body odor. If you notice an unpleasant smell, it could indicate dental disease (bad breath), ear buildup, or anal gland issues. Consult your veterinarian in such cases.

Room Odor Control

Installing an air purifier, ventilating regularly, and frequently washing fabric items (curtains, sofa covers, etc.) are effective strategies. Pet-specific deodorizing sprays can also be used as a supplement.

zh.title: 猫咪除臭完全指南：猫砂盆、体味与室内异味
zh.content:
与猫咪一起生活时，异味是常见的困扰。只要采取适当的措施，就能保持舒适的居住环境。

猫砂盆的除臭对策

猫砂盆是最主要的异味来源。每天至少清理2次、使用除臭效果好的猫砂、使用双层系统猫砂盆都是有效的方法。在猫砂盆附近放置除臭机也值得推荐。

体味对策

健康的猫咪几乎没有体味。如果感觉有异味，可能是口腔疾病（口臭）、耳朵污垢或肛门腺问题等，建议咨询兽医。

室内除臭对策

安装空气净化器、定期开窗通风、勤洗窗帘和沙发套等布艺制品，这些都是有效的方法。同时配合使用宠物专用除臭喷雾效果更佳。
